seo.title: Riomaggiore Attractions 2025 | Top Sights & Must-See Places
seo.description: Explore Riomaggiore's top attractions from the colorful harbor to Via dell'Amore, historic churches, and scenic viewpoints. Complete guide to must-see sights.

body.title: Iconic Sights & Hidden Gems
body.subtitle: From the famous colorful harbor to medieval churches and romantic coastal paths, discover what makes Riomaggiore unforgettable.

features.title: The Harbor (Marina)
features.description: Colorful fishing boats, tower-houses, and waterfront cafes create Cinque Terre's most photographed scene

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: The famous Lover's Walk carved into the cliff, connecting to Manarola in 20 romantic minutes

features.title: San Giovanni Battista
features.description: 14th-century Gothic church with beautiful rose window and panoramic terrace

features.title: Riomaggiore Castle
features.description: Medieval castle ruins offering spectacular views over the village and coastline

features.title: Via Colombo
features.description: Main street lined with shops, restaurants, and local artisans in colorful buildings

features.title: Santuario di Montenero
features.description: Hilltop sanctuary with breathtaking panoramic views, reached via scenic hiking trail

body.title: Plan Your Riomaggiore Visit
body.description: Discover all the activities, trails, and experiences this spectacular village offers.
